text: The Men's singles competition of the 2019 World Table Tennis Championships was held from 23 to 28 April 2019. Ma Long defended his title by defeating Mattias Falck 11–5, 11–7, 7–11, 11–9, 11–5 in the final. ==Seeds== # Fan Zhendong (Fourth round) # Xu Xin (Third round) # Lin Gaoyuan (Quarterfinals) # Tomokazu Harimoto (Fourth round) #
